twi.title: MEDE ME NKWA MAA WO
verses: Mede me nkwa maa wo Hwiee me mogya dehyeε gui Sε wo bε de wo ho Anyani afi owuo m’ Mede, mede me nkwa maa wo Deεn na wode ama me?
M’Agya fie a εhyerεn M’anu’onyam ahendwa no Megyae baa asaase yi sum mu Nante-brε ne awerεhoэ m’ Megyae, megyae ne nyinaa maa wo Deεn na woagyae ama me?
Mehuu amaneε pii maa wo Kyεn deε wobεtumi aka Yea a εnni kabea De gyee wo fii εgya m’ M’asoa, m’asoa ne nyinaa ama wo Deεn na w’asoa ama me?
Mede nkwagye a εyε pε Medэ ne fafiri nso Fi me soro fie nohoaa Abεkyε wo kwa Mede, mede nepa kyε wo Deεn na wode brε me?

english.title: THE SOLID ROCK
verses: My hope is built on nothing less Than Jesus blood and righteousness I dare not to trust the sweetest frame But wholly lean on Jesus’ name.
When darkness veils his lovely face I rest on His unchanging grace In every high and stormy gale, My anchor holds within the veil.
His oath, His covenant, His blood, Support me in the whelming flood When all around my soul gives way, He then is all my hope and stay.
When he shall come with trumpet sound O may I then in him be found Dressed in his righteousness alone, Faultless to stand before the throne.
english.chorus: On Christ, the solid rock, I stand; All other ground is sinking sand, All other ground is sinking sand.

twi.title: эBOTAN NO
verses: M’nidasoэ nyinaa biribi a so Sε Yesu mogya ne tenenee Mentumi ntwere wiase dε mpo Mede meho to Yesu so.
S’εsum kata m’anim mpo a Metwere n’adэe a εnsa da no Asorekye ne ahum bra mu Me tintim wэ me wura no mu.
Ne bэhyε, n’apam, ne mogya Kura me nsuyiri no mu Sε ade nyinaa di me hwaumэ a эno na эyε m’anidasoэ.
Sε эba wэ osebэ mu a O ma эnhu me wэ ne mu Menfa ne tenenee no nko nhyε.
twi.chorus: Megyina Yesu, эbotan no so Baabiara a aka no yε aforэ Baabiara a aka no yε aforэ.

english.title: MORE ABOUT JESUS
verses: More about Jesu would I know More of his grace to others sho More of his saving fullness see More of his love who died for me.
More about Jesus let me learn More of His holy will discern Spirit of God my teacher be Showing the things of Christ to me.
More about Jesus in his word Holding communion with my Lord Hearing his voice in every line Making each faithful saying mine.
More about Jesus on his throne Riches in glory all his own More of his kingdom’s sure increase More of his coming, prince of peace.
english.chorus: More, more about Jesus, More, more about Jesu More of his saving fullness see More of his love who died for me.

twi.title: YESU HO NSεM PII
verses: Mesua Yesu ho nsεm no pii Mεka n’adom no akyerε pii Mεhu ne nkwagye mayε pii Mepε m’Agyenkwa dэ no pii.
Ma mensua Yesu ho nsεm pii Na menhu ne pε kronkron pii Nyame Honhom nyε me kyerεkyerεfoэ εnyi Kristo adi nkyerε me.
Mehu Yesu wэ N’asεm mu pii Me ne me wura di nkitaho Mete ne nne n’asεm bi a mu Mema ne nsεm no fa me ho.
Ka эhene Yesu ho nsεm pii Anuonyam nyinaa yε ne de Na ahenie no nkэ so nterε pii Asomdwoe hene no bεba bio.
twi.chorus: Yesu ho nsεm no pii Yesu ho nsεm no pii Mεhu ne nkwagye mayε pii Mepε m’Agyenkwa dэ no pii.

english.title: GIVE ME THE BIBLE
verses: Give me the Bible, star of gladness To cheer the wanderer one and tempest tossed; No storms can hide that radiance peaceful beaming Since Jesus came to seek and save the lost.
Give me the Bible when my heart is broken When sin and grief have filled my soul with fear Give me the precious words by Jesus spoken Hold up faith’s lamp to show my Savior near.
Give me the Bible, all my steps enlighten, Teach me the danger of theses realms below That lamp of safety o’er the gloom shall brighten That light alone the path of peace can show.
Give me the Bible, lamp of life immortal Hold up that splendor by the open grave; Show me the light from heaven’s shining portals Show me the glory gulding Jordan’s wave.
english.chorus: Give me the Bible till night shall vanish in eternal day Holy message shining, thy light shall guide me in the narrow way

twi.title: FA TWERε NO MA ME
verses: Fa twerε no ma me εyε anigye nsoroma εkyekye kwantuni brεfoэ werε Ahum bi ntumi nnha saa nsoroma yi nkyε Fi sε Yesu baa bεgyee deε wayera.
Fa Twerε no ma me Berε a mekoma ayε merε Na bэne hu ahyε me kra ma Fa nsεmpa a Yesu aka no ma me Ma gyedie kanea so sε Yesu abεn.
Fa Twerε no ma me Na εnhyerεn me kwan so εnkyerε me wiase ha musuo Ahotэ kanea no bεpam musuo nyinaa Kanea no nko na εkyerε somdwoe kwan.
Fa Twerε no ma me Daa nkwa hann a εnnum da εhyerεn fεfε wэ deε damoa abue Kyerε me hann a εfi soro apondwa mu Kyerε me anuonyam a efi Jordan mu.
twi.chorus: Fa twerε no ma me Nsεm kronkron a εhyerεn Wo hann no bεwεn me kwan tea no mu Bэhyε ne mmrea ne эdэ ahyε mu ma Kэsi sε sum bεyear daa hann no mu.

english.title: O MASTER, LET ME WALK WITH THEE
verses: O Master, let me walk with thee In lowly paths of servie free Tell me thy secret help me bear The strain of toil, the fret of care.
Help me the slow of heart to move By some clear, winning work of love Teach me the wayward feet to stay And guide them in the homeward way.
Teach me thy patience still with thee In closer, dearer, company In work that keeps faith sweet and strong In trust that triumps over wrong.
In hope that sends a shining ray Far down the future’s broadening way In peace that only thou canst give With thee, O master, let me live.

twi.title: O MEWURA MA ME NE WO NANTE
verses: O mewura wo ne me nante Ahobreaseε ne эsom mu Ka woahuntasεm kyerε me Boa me na me nsoa эbra yi mu brε.
Boa me na menfa эdэ asεm bi Ntwe wэn a wakoma ayε duru Ma mensэ akobэfoэ mu Na menkyerε wэn efie kwan.
Kyerε me woaboterε na me Me nante ayэnkofa pa mu Dwuma a εma gyedie yε den Awerεhyem a edi bone so.
Anidosoэ a εde ne hann Hyerεn daakye kan kεse no mu Asomdwoe a wo nko de ma O me wura ma me ne wo ntena.
